title: WTB: T206 In PSA 4 To PSA 6
author: Charger74

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 In PSA 4 To PSA 6
posts.post_content:
Looking for the following with the PSA new label or hologram. Buying PSA 4 -PSA 6. Please let me know what you have, the back, your asking price and type of payment you accept. Scans would be appreciated. Thanks for your consideration.

Al Burch (Batting)
Howie Camnitz (Arm At Side)
Howie Camnitz (Arms Folded)
Howie Camnitz (Hands Above Head)
Jack Chesbro - Purchased
Ed Cicotte
Cad Coles
Lou Criger
Dode Criss
Josh Devore - Purchased

I have a Camnitz (Arm At Side), new label, Sovereign 460 PSA 4, but it's qualified as a miscut.  It has border around all sides, but the name is just slightly cut off.  If you're interested, let me know, I'll post a scan.
Thanks for the offer, I will pass at this point.
